definition: gall bladder/courage/guts/gall/inner container (e.g. bladder of a football, inner container of a thermos)
fullness for the bold, famine for the timid (idiom)
pinyin: cheng1 si3 dan3 da4 de5 , e4 si3 dan3 xiao3 de5
containing_words.word: 撐死膽大的，餓死膽小的

sentences.english: Standing on the starting line, we're all cowards.
sentences.chinese: 站在起跑線上，我們都是膽小者。

sentences.english: Why are some people very recreant can still you like to see horror piece?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼有的人很膽小可還是喜歡看恐怖片？

sentences.english: Aggressive and timid driving behavior is what leads to stop-and-go traffic.
sentences.chinese: 膽大和膽小的駕馭行爲導致了交通堵塞。

sentences.english: I was a nervous child, and when I grew, I was a nervous young man.
sentences.chinese: 我從小膽小怯弱，長大了，仍是一個膽怯的年輕人。

sentences.english: Seen here in a portal tract is an intense chronic inflammatory infiltrate with loss of bile ductules.
sentences.chinese: 圖中的門管區具有突出的慢性炎性浸潤而膽小管喪失。

sentences.english: I've never met anyone so lily-livered.
sentences.chinese: 我從沒見過這樣膽小的人。

sentences.english: You're just a couple of skinny-armed chickens.
sentences.chinese: 你們不過是兩個細胳膊細腿的膽小鬼。

sentences.english: He held them in contempt for behaving in such a cowardly way.
sentences.chinese: 他看不起他們，因爲他們這樣膽小怕事。

sentences.english: Cowards call themselves cautious and misers thrifty.
sentences.chinese: 膽小鬼說自己謹慎，守財奴稱自己節儉。

sentences.english: The courageous took to arms, the poltroons hid.
sentences.chinese: 勇敢的拿起了武器，膽小的躲了起來。

sentences.english: “You are a coward,” Mr. Brown cried out.
sentences.chinese: 布朗先生喊到，“你是個膽小鬼。”

sentences.english: He was the most timorous person in that event.
sentences.chinese: 在那次事件中他是個膽小鬼。

sentences.english: Kill off the Goddamned cowards and we will have a nation of brave men.
sentences.chinese: 幹掉所有狗日的膽小鬼，我們的國家將是勇士的天下。

sentences.english: She's a coward. She doesn't have the guts to dive off that cliff.
sentences.chinese: 她是一個膽小的人，她不敢從懸崖上跳入水中。

sentences.english: Thee coward was backing, his face being deathly pale, toward another room.
sentences.chinese: 那個膽小鬼向另一個房間退去，臉色煞白。

sentences.english: Gary sure is a chicken-livered guy.

definition: slow in one's reactions/sluggish (in movement or thought)
lacking in confidence/diffident/to have a guilty conscience
to only want to have a good time/to just want to have fun, and to shy away from self-discipline
to scare/to intimidate/to threaten/(interjection showing disapproval) tut-tut/(interjection showing astonishment)
to bear patiently/to endure silently/to forbear
